thread.title: BRIEF-Sun Life Announces Share Repurchase Program

title: BRIEF-Sun Life Announces Share Repurchase Program

organizations.name: brief-sun life announces share repurchase program reuters

text:
Feb 14 (Reuters) - Sun Life Financial Inc:
* SUN LIFE ANNOUNCES SHARE REPURCHASE PROGRAM AS PART OF NORMAL COURSE ISSUER BID
* SUN LIFE FINANCIAL INC - ‍REPURCHASE PROGRAM WILL FORM PART OF CO‘S NORMAL COURSE ISSUER BID ANNOUNCED ON AUGUST 9, 2017​
* SUN LIFE FINANCIAL INC - ‍SUN LIFE CURRENTLY INTENDS TO PURCHASE MAXIMUM OF 3.2 MILLION COMMON SHARES UNDER PROGRAM​
* SUN LIFE FINANCIAL INC - ‍ENTERED INTO A PROGRAM AGREEMENT WITH A THIRD PARTY TO REPURCHASE COMMON SHARES THROUGH DAILY PURCHASES​
* SUN LIFE FINANCIAL INC - ‍REPURCHASE WILL TAKE PLACE BETWEEN FEBRUARY 20, 2018 AND EARLIER OF AUGUST 13, 2018​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
